title: Best of British: Aston Martin
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobiles - Design and construction
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobile industry and trade
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Automobile industry and trade
description: Episode of Series "Best of British". The full story of Aston Martin begins in 1913 and continues through an uninterrupted pedigree of classic cars to the sleek DB7 and awesome V8 Vantage of today. This documentary examines in detail all the significant Aston Martin models from the past eighty years including the Brooklands racers from the 1920's, the rare 1940 Atom, the 'David Brown' sports cars, the V8 models and the latest DB7 'supercharged sixes'.
